attributes.action: make it illegal for HGV's to over take in the middle and fast lane of any motor ways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i know that i am not the only person who feels it is dangerouse for HGV drivers to overtake in the middle and fast lanes. especially in rush hour traffic. Please review the current legislation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
